text:
Hello everyone!

I want to write the template for home.html and I want to add the custom module in home.html.
In this module I have a field in styles -> background -> background_image.
I want to set the default picture for this field 'background_image' from this module in this file home.html .
Can help me somebody ?
I succed to write the default text for headline and subheadline field but for image I don't succed to set up the default image
Unfortunately we donâ€™t yet have public APIs for the knowledge base :disappointed:
Hello, any had any new issues with rendering contact properties that contain html in hubl email templates?
It was working fine for me just a week ago or so, and now it just outputs it as a string, rendering it useless. Nothing has changed on our end, and I tried using the `|safe` filter, but no dice.
